verses.translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree

verses.transliteration: Wa ma adraka ma laylatu al-qadr
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

verses.arabic: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.transliteration: Laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahr
verses.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months

verses.arabic: تَنزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.transliteration: Tanzzalu al-mala'ikatu war-ruhu fiha bi idhni rabbihim min kulli amr
verses.translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter
Peace it is until the emergence of dawn
